alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 28 at 11:17AM EDT until October 02 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Florida... Alafia River At Riverview near US 301 affecting Hillsborough County. For the Alafia...including Riverview near US 301...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING TO EARLY SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. This approaches the flood of record. * WHERE...Alafia River At Riverview near US 301. * WHEN...From Thursday morning to early Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 4.2 feet, Water begins to impact homes on Pine Avenue and Park Drive. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday the stage was -1.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 5.3 feet tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 4.2 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 5.3 feet on 09/17/2001. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (11 am EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Sun Mon Alafia River Riverview near US 4.2 -1.0 Wed 11 am 4.8 5.1 4.5 4.0 MSG &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 230 AM EDT.
